title: Can the effects of Sacred Fire King Garunix and Dark Hole Dragon, which each Special Summon themselves, be activated in the same Chain?
question:
While both Sacred Fire King Garunix and Dark Hole Dragon are in my Graveyard, a FIRE-Attribute monster in my Monster Zone is destroyed.

As a result, both Fire King Garunix'『Special Summon this card from your Graveyard or hand』effect and Dark Hole Dragon's『Special Summon this card from your Graveyard or hand』effect meet their activation condition. Can both of these effects be activated and form a Chain?
answer:
You can only activate one of these effects. They cannot be activated in the same Chain.

Only one Trigger Effect that Special Summons the activating monster itself, and that can be activated in the hand, can be activated in any given Chain. A "Trigger Effect that Special Summons the monster itself, and can be activated in the hand" also includes effects that can be activated in either the hand or the Graveyard, such as the effects of Sacred Fire King Garunix and Dark Hole Dragon, which your question mentions. Regardless of whether the effect is actually being activated in the hand or Graveyard, only one of this kind of Trigger Effect can be activated on any given Chain.

~~~

llm_answer:
Yes, both effects can be activated and form a Chain. When a FIRE monster is destroyed, both Sacred Fire King Garunix and Dark Hole Dragon's effects can be triggered. The turn player will choose the order in which the effects are placed on the Chain.

**Resolution:** Sacred Fire King Garunix and Dark Hole Dragon will both Special Summon themselves from the Graveyard in the order determined by the Chain.
